title: 一个多人联机的权限问题
author: a1759356067
txt_content:
请问如何让玩家在游戏里不能使用ess的tp，warp，spawn，和home系列的指令啊?
急求答案啊{:10_512:}

replies.author: Lucky777777
replies.txt_content:
a1759356067 发表于 2014-2-18 16:43
会出现什么提示吗
  会提示“You have xxx”这样的提示就是成功了

replies.author: 丶艹K8SAY
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: a1759356067
replies.txt_content:
丶艹K8SAY 发表于 2014-2-17 21:36
R U Sure?
你确定吗

replies.author: qq578021633
replies.txt_content:
essentials.tpa
essentials.warp
essentials.xxx
essentials.xxx
essentials.xxx

xxx改为你要玩家可以输入的指令即可

replies.author: Lucky777777
replies.txt_content:
/mangdelp builder essentials.tpa
   /mangdelp builder essentials.warp
   /mangdelp builder essentials.spawn
 把.后面更改成指令就可以

replies.txt_content:

   /mangdelp builder essentials.warp
   /mangdelp builder essenti ...
会出现什么提示吗
